name: hdb-resale
description: My Web Visualization Project (rewritten in React)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-server && npm run build-js
scripts.docker-test: npm run docker-test-A && npm run docker-test-B && npm run docker-test-C
scripts.docker-test-A: docker run --rm -it --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest node server_dist/worker/timeSeries.js
scripts.docker-test-B: docker run --rm -it --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest node server_dist/worker/heatmap.js
scripts.docker-test-C: docker run --rm -it --env-file env.list yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest node server_dist/worker/private.js
scripts.docker-push: docker push yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest && iron register yongjun21/hdb-resale:latest
scripts.upload-worker: npm run upload-worker-A & npm run upload-worker-B & npm run upload-worker-C
scripts.upload-worker-A: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL --name time_series yongjun21/hdb-resale node /hdb-resale/server_dist/worker/timeSeries.js
scripts.upload-worker-B: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL -e GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY=$GOOGLEMAPS_SERVER_KEY --name heatmap yongjun21/hdb-resale node /hdb-resale/server_dist/worker/heatmap.js
scripts.upload-worker-C: iron worker upload -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_USER -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_PASSWORD -e HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL=$HDBRESALE_MONGODB_URL -e URASPACE_ACCESS_KEY=$URASPACE_ACCESS_KEY --name private yongjun21/hdb-resale node /hdb-resale/server_dist/worker/private.js

author: Yong Jun
